trans-unit.source: How to Use Tab Completion in the Script Pane and Console Pane
trans-unit.target: 如何在脚本窗格和控制台窗格中使用 Tab 自动补全

trans-unit.source: How to Use Tab Completion in the Script Pane and Console Pane
trans-unit.target: 如何在脚本窗格和控制台窗格中使用 Tab 自动补全

trans-unit.source: Tab completion provides automatic Help when you are typing in the Script Pane or in the Command Pane.
trans-unit.target: 在脚本窗格或在命令窗格中进行键入时，Tab 自动补全将提供自动帮助。

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to take advantage of this feature:
trans-unit.target: 使用以下步骤来利用此功能：

trans-unit.source: To automatically complete a command entry
In the Command Pane or Script Pane, type a few characters of a command and then press TAB to select the desired completion text.
trans-unit.target: 在命令窗格或脚本窗格中，键入命令的几个字符，然后按 TAB 以选择所需补全文本。

trans-unit.source: If multiple items begin with the text that you initially typed, then continue pressing Tab until the item you want appears.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项以你最初键入的文本开头，那么继续按 Tab，直到出现所需的项。

trans-unit.source: Tab completion can help with typing a cmdlet name, parameter name, variable name, object property name, or a file path.
trans-unit.target: Tab 自动补全可以帮助键入 cmdlet 名、参数名、变量名、对象属性名或文件路径。

trans-unit.source: In the Script Pane, pressing TAB will automatically complete a command only when you are editing .ps1, .psd1, or .psm1 files.
trans-unit.target: 在脚本窗格中，仅当你编辑 .ps1、.psd1 或 .psm1 文件时，按 TAB 才会自动完成命令。

trans-unit.source: Tab completion works any time when you are typing in the Command Pane.
trans-unit.target: 在命令窗格中键入时，Tab 自动补全随时都起作用。

trans-unit.source: To automatically complete a cmdlet parameter entry
trans-unit.target: 自动完成 cmdlet 参数输入

trans-unit.source: In the Command Pane or Script pane, type a cmdlet followed by a dash, and then press TAB.
trans-unit.target: 在命令窗格或脚本窗格中，键入 cmdlet 后跟一个破折号，然后按 TAB 键。

trans-unit.source: For example, type `get-process -` and then press TAB multiple times to display each of the parameters for the cmdlet in turn.
trans-unit.target: 例如，键入 `get-process -`，然后多次按 TAB 键以显示 cmdlet 的每个参数。

trans-unit.source: [Using Windows PowerShell ISE](using-the-windows-powershell-ise.md) [How to Create a PowerShell Tab](How-to-Create-a-PowerShell-Tab-in-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md)
trans-unit.target: [使用 Windows PowerShell ISE](using-the-windows-powershell-ise.md) [如何创建 PowerShell 选项卡](How-to-Create-a-PowerShell-Tab-in-Windows-PowerShell-ISE.md)
